The consultation fee is just 200 but here they charge me 700

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had uterine fibroids which were quite large 13 -14 cm so I visited multiple doctors and came to Dr Bhargavi Reddy for Second Opinion looking at the hospital and the was the doctor seemed very experienced with dealing such cases I thought of getting it operated here in Life Plus Hospital, The Doctor took it as an challenge because there were few issues with the operation to save my uterus and she did it. she was so calm and co operative My operation went well and I came out of the Fibroid issue without damaging my Uterus.  the hospital is good for middle classe people because none of the prices mentioned in this hospital was inflated it was very reasonable and transparent.Dr Bhargavi Reddy is not behind money. the staff is very good and takes individual care In simple words Life Plus is trustworthy.

tags: None
review:
**** *** *** *** ******* *********** **** ****** ** ******** ** ** **** ***** I wanted to know about family planning. But she wasnâ€™t friendly enough to discuss anything. She just asked me to get tests done, did not cross question, and I was in and out in under 5mins.
***** ***********
For those of you looking for family planning and contraceptive related questions, donâ€™t bother going here

tags: None
review:
I recently visited Dr. Bhargavi Reddy at Life Plus Hospital in Indiranagar, Bangalore with several health concerns including high prolactin levels, white discharge, fatigue, and iron deficiency. Unfortunately, my experience with the service provided by Dr. Reddy was extremely disappointing.

First and foremost, I was taken aback by the doctor's behavior, which I found to be completely unacceptable. *** ***** **** ****** ** ********** *** ****** ** ******* * ***** *********** ** ** ****** ********* *** ************* *** ************** *** ** ****** ************ I felt uncomfortable with the way she addressed my concerns as an unmarried woman. *** **** ** *********** **** ******** *** ********** ***********.

What added to my disappointment was the lack of information provided about my condition. Dr. Reddy did not take the time to explain the nature of my infection or the reasons behind my symptoms. Instead, she swiftly prescribed medication without any detailed explanation. This left me feeling uninformed and unsure about my treatment plan.

Furthermore, the doctor's approach to follow-up care was lacking. After prescribing the medication, Dr. Reddy simply instructed me to return for a follow-up appointment after a week, without providing any further guidance or support.

Overall, my experience with Dr. Bhargavi Reddy at Life Plus Hospital was disheartening, and I would not recommend her services to anyone seeking compassionate and informative medical care. I believe that a patient's well-being should be treated with respect and empathy, qualities that were sorely lacking in this encounter. I hope that the hospital takes steps to address these issues and improve the quality of care provided to patients in the future.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
****** ****** **********
******* ***** **** **** * ******* ** ********* **** **** ** *** ********* ****** ******** ** ***** I had very bad experience of my life in this hospital.  I chose this hospital based on Dr Bhargavi Reddyâ€™s experience but failed to see all the flaws the hospital has.. 

1. UNTRAINED STAFF: Nurses here are totally untrained. **** **** *** ********* *** seem totally confused all the time. They do not even know to handle instruments used for certain test in pregnancy (eg NST). **** **** ** ** **** ***** ***** ********** ***** ******* ************** **** ** *** **** ** **** *** ***** ** ****** ****** ********  ***** ** *** *** **** **** ** **** **********
2. LACK OF HYGIENE: The place lacks hygiene in all aspects. I even seem to have caught infection from their surgical tool post c section. They have cats running around in the hospital. The bedspreads in the wards are dirty, stained and torn.

3. LACK OF FACILITY: 
The NST machine that was used to perform my non stress test was lying in the ally and was dragged and mishandled by the nurse. * ***** *** ******** ** *** ****** ******** ** ***  ******* ******* ** *** ********** based on which I was told I need to get an emergency C section.

Now  let me share my horrendous experience here in detail. I came for my regular checkup during my 36th week and I complained of less movement of baby.. I was asked to take non stress test using the machine i mentioned above. The nurse who performed my test *** *** **** **** *** ** ****** *** ********* *** kept calling other nurses for help who seemed to be equally confused . Finally they all fixed i* ***** **** *********** The test was run for 10 mins and my babies heart beat showed up high. Doctor said I should get an immediate c section.. They rushed me to the OT and performed the surgery and my baby was born with grunting. They do not have NICU to handle such cases.. They asked us to shift the baby to CMH hospital.They have * ***** ambulance parked outside the hospital. They shifted the baby in their innova without proper facility to place oxygen cylinder and the nurses asking each other to accompany the baby. Meanwhile I was directly moved to the ward without observation in post operative care. Post operation Dr did not even pay a visit the next morning. I was left to be treated under the hands of the under trained nurses. My baby ended up being in the CMH NICU for 15 days. I had to get admitted in CMH too ** ** ******** *** ****** ** *** ** ********* ** ****** ** *** ******* ***** *** **** * ***** **** ****** ** **** ***** *** After 18 days of non stop stress trauma and a heavy hospital bill my baby n I finally got home.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctors involvement wasn't that great in listening to the patient's problem and explain them accordingly. Dr. Bharghavi was just an observer and she had an assistant who leads the consultation. They don't want to listen and understand what the patient wants to tell, but were only busy in completing their notes and rushing to finish. It was like a rapid fire, question and answer rounds. They were asking for our suggestions, as what we wanted to do. *** ** **** ***** **** ** ******** **** ********* * ******* *** ** ** ***** **** *** ******* ** ********** And later, we agreed to do all the tests they both were busy writing in the pescription.
I personally felt, like I was in a temple waiting in the queue for Prasadam. You wait for long, take the prasadam and leave as early as possible ðŸ˜‚
I did not complete my treatment in life plus hospital and immediately changed to another doctor ** *********** She was expensive, but still she listened to us and had the complete counselling.
I am sure Dr Bhargavi Reddy must be very good and experienced, as I checked for her reviews before visiting. But, she must give little time to understand her patients to make them more comfortable. Also, there should be more privacy to treat a patient and not in an open space inforont of anyone coming in and going out. 
Otherwise, the hospital is nice and I am sure the doctor also must be very good and experienced, but in our case we did not get too many opportunities to interact with the doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
*** ** *** **** ********* *** **** *** ** *********** Management is very friendly and helpful.. No unnecessary hype created regarding the treatment like corporate hospital., *** *** ******* * **** ***** Dr. charging Rs-100/- for consultation in Indira Nagar? visit once and decide your self about the quality.. 
P.S: I am no marketing guy and am not paid for this review. This truly to encourage people to visit a value/quality for money hospital instead wasting money on corporate business hospitals.

tags: Value for money,
review: I booked this appointment on prime (wait time will be 1hr or less). But I had to wait for 1 and half an hour. I reached clinic at 5.50pm for which appointment was taken at 6pm. But doctor came around 7.20pm. She checked patients really very fast. I had stomach pain since a week so consulted gynic to check the problem. Initially she said itâ€™s gastric pain and suggested to do check scan and found that I have pregnancy. No further advise was given like what foods to be taken and no precautions had given.

tags: None
review:
Experience with the doctor has been very good from day one. She patiently listens and advices accordingly. Issues which can be handled without any extra medications is preferred by her. One can be assured of not eating medicines unnecessarily. She is straightforward and firm in her advices. One can freely share all the concerns with her and her colleague Dr. Indrani who is present with her on most occasions. 
The major concern is the staff especially at the reception desk. They need to be proactive and organised in managing appointments. The nurses are very helpful and friendly. There are admin staff who are always trying to keep a check on how things are going on. Waiting time is longer and there is no preference for practo appointments. Hoping to see the improvement in facilities and coordination between the lab staff and reception desk.

tags: None
review: Not satisfied with the way they treated or checked the patient, the assistant does all the work and checks. We were looking for a through check of the patient based on her inputs. They just believe on reports *** ***** ***** ***** ** ***********

Then we went to the other hospital *** **** ****** *** ** **** *** ********** *** ******* *** **** ** **** ******** ***** *** ***** ** **** *********  *********** ********* ** ** ******* *** *** ***** *********** ******* *** ******* **** ******** ** ************* *** *******  ******* **** ****** **** ***** ** ******* ***** ****** *** **** *** ******** ***** ******* ********* * *** ****** ** ***** *** ******* ** ******* **** * ** **** ********* ***** ** ** ***** ****** ****** ******* ****** *** * **** ** **** ****** *** **** **** ** *** **** *** **** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: I do not recommend anyone to visit this hospital. My appointment was at 6.45 however I met the doctor at 8.30, post waiting for that long we expected a proper consultation, yet again the doctor seemed to look in a hurry, she hardly met us for a mere 40seconds and it was over, ** ****** ************ ** ******** ***** ** ** * ********* ** **** ****** ****** **** ***** * ******* She gave us a prescription-1 tablet which I failed to get in multiple medical stores, I had to call back to the hospital and check if it is available in their in house medical store, I got a positive response from them so I drove back from Hebbal to Indiranagar yet again, after I reached I found it was a different tablet, and the guy in the store was giving me not so genuine reasons, would never visit Dr Bhargavi ever again or this hospital where I saw patients running from 1st floor to ground multiple to get medicines, they have to bill in the first floor, however pat for it in the ground floor and go back to the first floor to get the medicines. I don't understand this logic at all, anyways it's a 0 rating hospital

tags: None
review: The doctor was not on time. The staff had no idea when the doctor will be available. The doctor *** ******* ********** *** **** ** ********* ******* ********* ** ***** * *** ****** ******** *** **** *** offered to examine me. She also did not communicate clearly and did not explain the issue and why and how it happened.

review:
Have seen couple of other hospital, but in the comparison I feel this is a very good hospital like the way Dr treat and entire staff is also good. 

Good thing abt this hospital is proper management cleanliness and friendly 

They took very good care of my baby n wife.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Me & my wife blessed with Baby Girl on 22 nd August, it was memorable day in our life, I am thank full to  each & every member of the hospital including doctors, nurses, hospital staff, all are nice& jovial people, calm environment, I would recommend lifeplus hospital, with out any slight hesitation for arrival of your next generation, Live Long & Prosper Life Plus Hospital

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hello Bhargavi Madam.. Thank you for your treatment and caring and you have given best suggestions and prescriptions during the whole pregnancy cycle. We are so much happy and finally our little princess is in our hands with good health.

Thanks again for your help and cooperation for the entire hospital unit(Doctors,nurses,staff..etc)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: visited for pregnency checkup but doctor doesnt hav patience to listen to our problems just busy in writing their prescription and finish their work *** ** ****** ******** also even after doing all the tests they told and my problem also not solved so i had to change doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: The hospital is terrible. There is no proper management. Even if you take an appointment via practo , the visits are on first come first serve basis with an avg wait time of 2 hours. There are no proper equipment, zero hygiene and the diagnosis room is not even well lit. The doctor is friendly, but she won't be able to explain the issue properly because there are already other patients waiting beside you. This isn't a right place to go if you have privacy concerns, and need a proper diagnosis.

tags: None
review: Running a hospital where fees is 200 but every time you visit she ask for test which cost more than twice what other labs charge. And the condition is you have to get the test some from the same hospital otherwise doctor wouldn't consider it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had visited the doctor based on the reviews given here. There's no problem with the treatment given but DrBhargavi was more an observer. That's all. I expected that the doctors Bhargavi Reddy and Sridevi would provide more explanation on my problems but it was the other way round. I asked them questions and they simply answered in one sentence. Also they were discussing something else while I was explaining my issues. There's no patient privacy. They charge very less when compared to other doctors, very happy but not satisfied with the doctors' approach.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a really bad experience with the doctor. As the doctor was being extremely judgemental before even asking me about my condition. I was diagnosed with PCOD and I had alot of doubts regarding. All she did was prescribed pills and mockingly said "just reduce weight!". For somebody being diagnosed with PCOD and has zero knowledge about it. I would have liked it more if the doctor was warm, friendly and was less judgemental!! Extremely disappointed with the staff as well. Nobody has any clue around that hospital. I would certainly not recommend this docter!!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Greeting for the day , 
Hope all are doing well and congratulations for all future mommies and daddiesðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š

We consulted Dr.Bhargavi reddy from beginning of our pregnancy. Initially we admitted for emergency and continued for full term.  Doctor is experienced in assistance, decisions  and medications. She was clear on her decision based on the patient condition/History , We have been assisted with choice of Normal delivery and by God's Grace our delivery  happened within a day. All staffs are friendly and In-patient nurses/visiting doctors are very kind. 
Overall for pregnancy care Lifeplus is a better choice when it comes to consultation charges, reachability and experience. Thanks to all staffs , we were blessed with baby boy on 01/08/2020.
we see issues with Scan wait time , Frequent changes with medicine companies and Hospital environment. We suggested to improve in these areas as well. 

Take care
Cheers 
Mr/Mrs/Jr. Subbaraman

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Visited Doctor to check on my wifeâ€™s nipple crack, asked us where was the baby delivered, as soon as we told the our hospital name conversation was just 2 minutes, reluctant to listen to everything, asked her to sleep on the bed ***** *** *** ** ****** **** * **** ********* sister and doc struggling to push the screen to cover, Doc said everything is alright and gave 1 tablet and sent. With this prolong experience of doc, we would expect to treat patients Irrespective of patient outside hospital fairly and understand what is happening to the patient. Felt bad about the overall experience. This is our personal experience.

tags: Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Exercise,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I want Hospital after taking appointment on practo as well at hospital .. they told me Dr is available till 8:30 pm u can come . As i reach there she was not there. Receptionist told me that due to some emergency she is not here. U can saw to Dr shridevi she is available. But when we talk other staff they told that Dr bhargavi is on leave she will be back on 14th . I m 32 week pregnant it was very tough to travel but these guys donâ€™t understand.. they lie to make patients to visit.. so i dont like .. i just paid the fees and went.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,

I don't feel like visiting them again. They are not bothered explaining the health condition clearly. She just ask nad write tablets. That's not right way to evaluate a patient. They should some spend to understand the history and suggestions needs to be given. They are in a hurry to move to next patient. Bhargavi Reddy doesn't speak at all. * ********* **** ****** **** ****** *** ****** ***** * *******
I strongly don't recommend them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: They were just waiting for me to leave and attend the next patient. Didn't even explain me what my problem was or allow me to ask questions, just asked me to get a test done. It was highly uncomfortable as there were two people sitting inside. Did not feel private at all.

review: Not a great experience nor dissatisfied. The consultation fee is less compared to others. On the first visit itself she advised to admit her without talking much.
